body:
Hey. I haven't been on Avicus for about 3 months now, and it looks like a lot of stuff changed. First off, I left because all of my IRL friends stopped playing Minecraft so I got really bored. Second, I was going to wait for staff apps to open again but now honestly, I don't think I'd be fit for staff right now due to my inactivity. Third, I'm really sorry for cutting off in the middle of The Excalibur Saga (for the second time)... Anyway, hopefully I'm back. I'm also starting YouTube, and if anyone would want to record a video with me I might be up for that. So, hey Avicus! I guess I'm back.

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCuwJEThNu7pBee4v7G74HFg

title: I'm Back (Sort of).

replies.body: Welcome back zach! You missed a lot!
